page.title: 16REPORTS ON FARM VISITS
page.content: {SOMERSET FARM}situated on the High Street it is a small farm of 105 acres.It has 13 fields three interesting ones were {HUMPTY DUMPTY {CORN MARSH and THE WOOD.}In Humpty DUmpty ther was a battle fought 900 years ago.The Corn Marsh was very wet.The farm is a triangle shape and the house is 200 years old.The Steeles keep cattle and sell beef cows and calves.They make silage about 40 acres which they store in a pit,hay and grow some fruit. {MOUNT PLEASANT}This farm has 330 acres 18 fields and it keeps dairy cattle.the farmer also grows 70 acres of winter wheat.The cows are milked at 5.30am and 3.30pm.there were three workers who 2000 bales of hay and straw which produce 800,000 litres of milk a year.there were also horses and
